title: Partial and complete ordering
content: We have not yet defined relations ( ~ df-rel ), but here we introduce a few related notions we will use to develop ordinals. The class variable ` R ` is no different from other class variables, but it reminds us that normally it represents what we will later call a "relation".

blocks.name: wpo
blocks.content: Extend wff notation to include the strict partial ordering predicate. Read: " ` R ` is a partial order on ` A ` ".
blocks.origin: prop wff wpo(class c0, class c1) { c0 ⪯ c1 }

wor
blocks.content: Extend wff notation to include the strict complete ordering predicate. Read: " ` R ` orders ` A ` ".
blocks.origin: prop wff wor(class c0, class c1) { c0 ≺ c1 }

df-po
blocks.content: Define the strict partial order predicate. Definition of [Enderton] p. 168. The expression ` R Po A ` means ` R ` is a partial order on ` A ` . For example, ` < Po RR ` is true, while ` <_ Po RR ` is false ( ~ ex-po ). (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-1997.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-po(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-po(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⪯ c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(¬ s0[c0]s0 ∧((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-so
blocks.content: Define the strict complete (linear) order predicate. The expression ` R Or A ` is true if relationship ` R ` orders ` A ` . For example, ` < Or RR ` is true ( ~ ltso ). Equivalent to Definition 6.19(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-so(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wor(c0, c1), wa(wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-so(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≺ c1 ↔(c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
}

blocks.name: poss
blocks.content: Subset theorem for the partial ordering predicate. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-1997.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm poss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wpo(c2, c1), wpo(c2, c0)))
} = {
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wpo(c2, c1), wpo(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))))))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))))))))
  syld(wss(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))))))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))))))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))))))))
  ssralv(hs0, c0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)))))))
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, wss(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)))))), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)))))))
  ss2ralv(hs1, hs2, c0, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)))))
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c1)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm poss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c2 ⪯ c1 → c2 ⪯ c0))
} = {
  3imtr4g(c0 ⊆ c1, c2 ⪯ c1, c2 ⪯ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2))))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2))))))
  syld(c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2))))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2))))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2))))))
  ssralv(hs0, c0, c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2)))))
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2)))), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2)))))
  ss2ralv(hs1, hs2, c0, c1, (¬ hs0[c2]hs0 ∧((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c2]hs2)→ hs0[c2]hs2)))
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c1)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: poeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for partial ordering predicate. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-1997.)
blocks.origin:
thm poeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wpo(c0, c2), wpo(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wceq(c0, c1), wpo(c0, c2), wpo(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))))))
  2ralbidv(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs2, c2, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))), wral(hs2, c2, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  ralbidv(hs2, c2, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))), wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  notbid(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0)))
  breq(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))
  breq(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  breq(c0, c1, cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  breq(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c2)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm poeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c0 ⪯ c2 ↔ c1 ⪯ c2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(c0 = c1, c0 ⪯ c2, c1 ⪯ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(¬ hs0[c1]hs0 ∧((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)→ hs0[c1]hs2))))))
  2ralbidv(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, c0 = c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))), ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(¬ hs0[c1]hs0 ∧((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)→ hs0[c1]hs2))))
  ralbidv(hs2, c2, c0 = c1, (¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)), (¬ hs0[c1]hs0 ∧((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)→ hs0[c1]hs2)))
  anbi12d(c0 = c1, ¬ hs0[c0]hs0, ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2), ¬ hs0[c1]hs0, ((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)→ hs0[c1]hs2))
  notbid(c0 = c1, hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c1]hs0)
  breq(c0, c1, hs0, hs0)
  imbi12d(c0 = c1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), hs0[c0]hs2, (hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2), hs0[c1]hs2)
  anbi12d(c0 = c1, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, hs0[c1]hs1, hs1[c1]hs2)
  breq(c0, c1, hs0, hs1)
  breq(c0, c1, hs1, hs2)
  breq(c0, c1, hs0, hs2)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c2)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs2.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

thm nfpo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnf(s0, wpo(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, wpo(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))))))
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)
  nfral(s0, hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  nfral(s0, hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  nfral(s0, hs2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))))
  nfn(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)))
  nfbr(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))
  nfim(s0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))
  nfan(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))
  nfbr(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  nfbr(s0, cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfbr(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
}

thm nfpo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, c0 ⪯ c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, c0 ⪯ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))))))
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)
  nfral(s0, hs0, c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))))
  nfral(s0, hs1, c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))))
  nfral(s0, hs2, c1, (¬ hs0[c0]hs0 ∧((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))
  nfan(s0, ¬ hs0[c0]hs0, ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2))
  nfn(s0, hs0[c0]hs0)
  nfbr(s0, hs0, c0, hs0)
  nfim(s0, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), hs0[c0]hs2)
  nfan(s0, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2)
  nfbr(s0, hs0, c0, hs1)
  nfbr(s0, hs1, c0, hs2)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nfbr(s0, hs0, c0, hs2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

thm ispod(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wpo(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  ralrimivvva(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, w0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))
  jca(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  3ad2antr1(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  df-po(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
}

thm swopolem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))→(c0[c4]c2 →(c0[c4]c3 ∨ c3[c4]c2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1))→(s0[c4]s1 →(s0[c4]s2 ∨ s2[c4]s1)))

blocks.content: A strict weak order is a partial order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

thm swopo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wpo(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  ispod(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.01d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  ancli(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  id(wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, cv(s2), c1, cv(s2), c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  breq1(cv(s0), cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))
  breq2(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s1), c0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2))))
  breq2(cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(s2), c0)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)))
  breq1(cv(s1), cv(s2), c0, cv(s2))
  sylan2d(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  3adantr1(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  expimpd(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))
  ord(wa(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))
  orcomd(wa(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))
  imp(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2))))
  diff.wn.s(s1, wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s2)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s2), c0, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm swopo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⪯ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(s0[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(s2[c0]s0 →(s2[c0]s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  ispod(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.01d((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), s2[c0]s2)
  syl2anr(w0, s2 ∈ c1, (s2[c0]s2 → ¬ s2[c0]s2), (s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s0))))
  ancli(s2 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c1)
  id(s2 ∈ c1)
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, (s0[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, s2, c1, s2, c1, (s0[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s0), (s2[c0]s2 → ¬ s2[c0]s2), (s2[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s2))
  imbi12d(s0 = s2, s0[c0]s1, ¬ s1[c0]s0, s2[c0]s1, ¬ s1[c0]s2)
  breq1(s0, s2, c0, s1)
  notbid(s0 = s2, s1[c0]s0, s1[c0]s2)
  breq2(s0, s2, s1, c0)
  imbi12d(s1 = s2, s2[c0]s1, ¬ s1[c0]s2, s2[c0]s2, ¬ s2[c0]s2)
  breq2(s1, s2, s2, c0)
  notbid(s1 = s2, s1[c0]s2, s2[c0]s2)
  breq1(s1, s2, c0, s2)
  sylan2d((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)), s2[c0]s0, s0[c0]s1, s2[c0]s1, ¬ s1[c0]s0)
  3adantr1(w0, s2 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1, (s0[c0]s1 → ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  expimpd((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)), s2[c0]s0, ¬ s1[c0]s0, s2[c0]s1)
  ord(((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))∧ s2[c0]s0), s1[c0]s0, s2[c0]s1)
  orcomd(((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))∧ s2[c0]s0), s1[c0]s0, s2[c0]s1)
  imp((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)), s2[c0]s0, (s2[c0]s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, s2[c0]s1, ¬ s1[c0]s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s2, c0, s1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, s1[c0]s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, c0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s2[c0]s2, ¬ s2[c0]s2)
  diff.wn.s(s1, s2[c0]s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s2, c0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: poirr

blocks.name: po2ne
blocks.content: Two classes which are in a partial order relation are not equal. (Contributed by AV, 13-Mar-2023.)

thm po2ne(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: po0

  anassrs(c0 ⪯ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c4]hs0)

  df-br(hs0, c4, hs0)

  imp(∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), ([hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c1 ∧[hs1 / s0]c3 ∈ c1 ∧[hs2 / s0]c3 ∈ c1))

  rspc(s0, hs0, c2, c3 ∈ c1, [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c1)

blocks.name: sotric
blocks.content: A strict order relation satisfies strict trichotomy. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotric(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wb(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wn(wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))))
} = {
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  impbid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)))
  jaod(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)))
  adantrr(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wi(wceq(c2, c3), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3))))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c3), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  sonr(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  breq2(c2, c3, c2, c0)
  con2d(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  sylibr(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wi(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c0, c2))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
  so2nr(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  imnan(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  ord(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))), w3o(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  solin(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3orass(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
}

blocks.name: sotrieq
blocks.content: Trichotomy law for strict order relation. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotrieq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wb(wceq(c2, c3), wn(wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))))
} = {
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(c2, c3), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  impbid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wn(wceq(c2, c3)))
  con2d(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wceq(c2, c3))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(c2, c3), wn(wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))), wn(wo(wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c2))))
  nsyl(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c2))
  adantrr(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  sonr(c0, c1, c2)
  pm1.2(wbr(c2, c0, c2))
  notbid(wceq(c2, c3), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c2)), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  orbi12d(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  breq2(c2, c3, c2, c0)
  breq1(c2, c3, c0, c2)
  ord(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(c2, c3), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
  sylib(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))), w3o(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  solin(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3orass(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  or12(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
}

blocks.name: sotr2
blocks.content: A transitivity relation. (Read ` B <_ C ` and ` C < D ` implies ` B < D ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotr2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wi(wa(wn(wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(c3, c0, c4)), wbr(c2, c0, c4)))
} = {
  impd(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wn(wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  sylbird(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wn(wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wi(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4)), wo(wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wo(wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  3adantr3(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wb(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wn(wo(wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))))
  ancom2s(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wb(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wn(wo(wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))))
  sotric(c0, c1, c3, c2)
  jaod(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wi(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4)))
  a1i(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wi(wceq(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4))))
  biimpd(wceq(c3, c2), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  breq1(c3, c2, c0, c4)
  expd(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  sotr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}

blocks.name: issod
blocks.content: An irreflexive, transitive, linear relation is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm issod(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wor(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wpo(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wor(c0, c1), wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  df-so(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issod(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⪯ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⪯ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, (s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))
  df-so(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: issoi
blocks.content: An irreflexive, transitive, linear relation is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm issoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wor(c0, c1)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mptru(wor(c0, c1))
  issod(s0, s1, c0, c1, wtru)
  ispod(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ≺ c1
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 → ¬ s0[c0]s0)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)→((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  mptru(c0 ≺ c1)
  issod(s0, s1, c0, c1, wtru)
  ispod(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c0]s0)
  adantl(wtru, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), ((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))
  adantl(wtru, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (s0[c0]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: isso2i
blocks.content: Deduce strict ordering from its properties. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isso2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wor(c0, c1)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  issoi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  anidms(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  mpbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  orci(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  equid(s0)
  chvarv(s1, s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq1w(s1, s0, c1)
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  equequ2(s1, s0, s0)
  breq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0), c0)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  orrd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  con2bid(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  3orass(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.wb.s(s1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wo.s(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  diff.wn.s(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isso2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ≺ c1
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c0]s1 ↔ ¬(s0 = s1 ∨ s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)→((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  issoi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  anidms(s0 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c0]s0)
  mpbii((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), ¬ s0[c0]s0, (s0 = s0 ∨ s0[c0]s0))
